page.title: 04 ANGLIA ALPINES
page.content: Anglia Alpines is a Wholesale Nursery specialising in herbs and Alpine plants.It has been established eight years and employs eight full-time workers,and fifty casual workers during March to September. The Nursery covers an area of seven acres.On this land there are four large and two small greenhouses,and twelve tunnels housing cuttings and seedlings. The greenhouses have automatic sprinkler systems.The Nursery makes its own compost from grit,peat,loam and bark using a mixing machine.There is also a machine for potting.There are ninety varieties of herbs and over a million plants.
